author: Lisa A. Cooper and Joshua M. Sharfstein
title: Opinion | A Game Plan to Help the Most Vulnerable
description: It won’t be enough to wear face masks and use Zoom. Here’s what we really need to do.
content:
Whos most at risk?
The people most vulnerable to severe illness from the novel coronavirus include older persons and those with chronic medical conditions conditions that are disproportionately found in socially disadvantaged populations. Racial and ethnic m… [+6598 chars]
